channel.title: Create a SAML app integration :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Create a SAML app integration Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: This document covers only how to create an app integration in the Admin Console, dimensioned by the type of integration you want to create. So this https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/sign-into-web-app-redirect/asp-net-core-3/main/#create-an-app-integration-in-the-admin-console but probably with some updating so it fits as many scenarios as it can without becoming too unwieldy. The full guide is on help.
